name: Betwixt (Corvid Quill—Joey Kalitovic)
description:
You have fallen into a mysterious cavern filled with long-hanging roots.
The only path forward is winding further in.
But what awaits you in the deep?

                                                                                                                                                                                            

Submitted for GGJ 2023 "Roots"

Created in Unreal Engine 5.1
